entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Winkler

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
